data.name: World Racing 2 - Champion Edition
data.detailed_description:
Italy, Egypt and Hawaii already make your heart beat faster? Then what do over 100 challenging race tracks and more than 80 cars sound like? Sounds like fun, we agree.

And fun is also what World Racing 2 is all about. With five game modes to choose from, from arcade to simulation, World Racing 2 has everything a racer's heart desires. The visual and logical damage model also boosts the realism and adds another gear to the fun of the game!

FEATURES:

  • Lead foot: Various game modes such as Arcade, Simulation, Mission Mode, Training and multiplayer racing provide full throttle atmosphere
  • Worldwide: More than 100 race tracks await you, which can also be used off-road
  • Enormous: Over 80 different vehicles leave nothing to be desired
  • Innovative: The realistic damage model comes up with dirt, scratches and dents and influences the driving behaviour accordingly
  • Attention: New side and oncoming traffic can quickly thwart your victory
  • As desired: Individual adjustment of colours, wheels, body vinyl etc.

data.short_description: Thrilling racing game with over 100 tracks and more than 80 different cars. With the various game modes World Racing 2 has everything a racer's heart desires.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8,10,11
  • Processor: 1.8 GHZ
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB 3D Graphic Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8,10,11
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB 3D Graphic Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Supported
